form_introtext: This is de gratis online tool van DigiFundmanager waarbij je eenvoudig real-time berekeningen kan uitvoeren met het programma. Vul je gewenste waarden in en ga op zoek naar jouw optimale portefeuille.
Api server fout. Probeer het later opnie: Api server error. Please try again later.
Pas de waarden hiernaast aan naar uw per: Set the correct values in the form.
This seems to be taking too long.

PennyStocks.info: Lower price = higher risk and reward

GrowthPotential.info: Lower adjusted price relative to IPO = more growth potential

HedgePercentage.label: Choose for hedging
BalanceRR.info: Risk/Reward approaches 1 = balanced risk and reward
BalanceRR.label: Balance Risk & Reward

TransactionCosts.info: Higher broker fees = higher risk and lower reward
TransactionCosts.label: Transaction costs
LoanPercentage.info: Higher loan costs = higher risk and lower reward

DividendTax.info: Higher tax = higher risk and lower reward
